data.trans_hint: Anh ấy vẫn sống chung với bố mẹ.
data.en_hint: He still lives with his parents.
data.content_game_1: He still lives with his parents.
data.answer_en_hint: He still lives with his parents.

data.trans_hint: Thi thoảng tôi cảm thấy như mẹ chồng tôi thích việc chê trách bất cứ việc gì tôi làm.
data.en_hint: Sometimes I feel that my mother-in-law enjoys finding fault with whatever I do.
data.content_game_1: Sometimes I feel that my mother-in-law enjoys finding fault with whatever I do.
data.answer_en_hint: Sometimes I feel that my mother-in-law enjoys finding fault with whatever I do.

data.trans_hint: Người quản lý thực sự đã làm khó cô nhiều. Anh ấy liên tục lăng mạ cô ấy trước mặt cả đội.
data.en_hint: The manager really gave her a hard time. He kept telling her off in front of the team.
data.content_game_1: The manager really gave her a hard time. He kept telling her off in front of the team.
data.answer_en_hint: The manager really gave her a hard time. He kept telling her off in front of the team.

data.trans: Giải quyết (một cuộc tranh luận) với ai đó
data.trans_hint: Bạn không thể chịu đựng trong im lặng như vậy được, giải quyết nó với anh ta đi. Hãy nói cho anh ấy biết bạn cảm thấy như thế nào và những gì anh ấy làm là sai.
data.en_hint: You can't suffer in silence like this, have it out with him. Tell him how you feel, and that what he did was wrong.
data.content_game_1: You can't suffer in silence like this, have it out with him. Tell him how you feel, and that what he did was wrong.
data.answer_en_hint: You can't suffer in silence like this, have it out with him. Tell him how you feel, and that what he did was wrong.

data.trans: Cảm thấy ác cảm với ai vì điều gì
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy nghĩ rằng anh ta đã đâm sau lưng cô ấy, và cô ấy cảm thấy ác cảm với anh ta vì điều đó.
data.en_hint: She thinks that he stabbed her in the back, and she holds that against him.
data.content_game_1: She thinks that he stabbed her in the back, and she holds that against him.
data.answer_en_hint: She thinks that he stabbed her in the back, and she holds that against him.

data.trans: Ngắt lời, nhảy vào họng ai
data.trans_hint: Tôi đang cố gắng truyền đạt ý tưởng của tôi nhưng không thể vì anh ta cứ nhảy vào họng tôi.
data.en_hint: I was trying to get across my idea but couldn't because he kept jumping down my throat.
data.content_game_1: I was trying to get across my idea but couldn't because he kept jumping down my throat.
data.answer_en_hint: I was trying to get across my idea but couldn't because he kept jumping down my throat.

data.trans_hint: Vì mất một vị khách hàng quan trọng, sếp tôi tức giận với toàn đội.
data.en_hint: Losing an important client, my boss lashed out at the whole team.
data.content_game_1: Losing an important client, my boss lashed out at the whole team.
data.answer_en_hint: Losing an important client, my boss lashed out at the whole team.

data.trans: Rũ bỏ, lờ đi, bỏ qua một cái gì đó
data.trans_hint: Đừng cố gắng rũ bỏ sự tức giận. Thay vào đó, hãy chấp nhận rằng bạn đang tức giận và từ từ để cảm giác đó qua đi.
data.en_hint: Don't try to shrug the anger off. Instead, accept that you are angry and slowly let the feeling go.
data.content_game_1: Don't try to shrug the anger off. Instead, accept that you are angry and slowly let the feeling go.
data.answer_en_hint: Don't try to shrug the anger off. Instead, accept that you are angry and slowly let the feeling go.

data.trans_hint: Trước khi bạn tức giận một ai đó, hãy bình tĩnh lại và xem xét những gì đang xảy ra.
data.en_hint: Before you want to lash out at somebody, step back from the situation and take a look at what is really going on.
data.content_game_1: Before you want to lash out at somebody, step back from the situation and take a look at what is really going on.
data.answer_en_hint: Before you want to lash out at somebody, step back from the situation and take a look at what is really going on.

data.trans: Kiểm tra, xem xét, suy nghĩ thật kĩ
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy cần xem xét lại cái cách mà cô ấy quản lý nhân viên của mình.
data.en_hint: She needs to take a long look at the way she is managing her employees.
data.content_game_1: She needs to take a long look at the way she is managing her employees.
data.answer_en_hint: She needs to take a long look at the way she is managing her employees.

data.trans_hint: Cha mẹ không quản lý tốt cảm xúc của mình có thể dễ dàng trút sự tức giận lên con cái của họ.
data.en_hint: Parents who don't manage their emotions very well can easily take their frustration out on their children.
data.content_game_1: Parents who don't manage their emotions very well can easily take their frustration out on their children.
data.answer_en_hint: Parents who don't manage their emotions very well can easily take their frustration out on their children.

data.trans: Vơ cái gì đó vào mình (cảm thấy chuyện gì là đang chĩa vào mình, xúc phạm mình)
data.trans_hint: Học cách không vơ mọi thứ về mình có thể mang lại rất nhiều lợi ích cho bạn về lâu dài.
data.en_hint: Learning not to take things personally can benefit you greatly in the long run.
data.content_game_1: Learning not to take things personally can benefit you greatly in the long run.
data.answer_en_hint: Learning not to take things personally can benefit you greatly in the long run.
